title: Do Sulfur Emissions from Wuhan, China, Point to Mass Cremation of Coronavirus Victims?
subtitle: A data map that appeared in a popular Twitter thread did not show what some people claimed.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Satellite data show a large release of sulfur dioxide gas from the outskirts of Wuhan, China, and could be viewed as evidence of the mass cremation of new coronavirus victims.
